synopsis.text: Runway de Waratte, also known as Smile Down the Runway, is an anime that delves into the world of fashion, featuring discussions on the style of renowned personalities and iconic anime characters. The first episode showcases Kim Jae-Joong, a prominent member of the Korean pop sensation, JYJ. Adding to the excitement, Kim's solo track 'Ray of Light' serves as the anime's captivating ending theme. Fans and enthusiasts alike can catch a glimpse of the super-deformed characters in a series of short episodes available on the official Runway de Waratte Twitter account. Immerse yourself in this vibrant fusion of music, fashion, and anime!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
